name: Resisting the Feminazi Regime Proves Futile and Violation Awaits
name_original: Resisting the Feminazi Regime Proves Futile and Violation Awaits
description:
Tired of the world ruled by a feminazi regime
that places women above men, the protagonist
stands up to fight the good manly fight!

But... he is tempted by monster girls and
seductresses... is defeated... and violated...
